dataset_id: BOREAS AES Canadian Hourly and Daily Surface Meteorological Data, R1
title: BOREAS AES Canadian Hourly and Daily Surface Meteorological Data, R1
summary: This data set contains hourly and daily meteorological data from 23 meteorological stations across Canada from January 1975 to January 1997. The surface meteorology parameters include: date, time, temperature, precipitation, snow, snow depth, sea level pressure, station pressure, dew point, wind direction, wind speed, dry and wet bulb temperature, relative humidity, cloud opacity and cloud amount.
